channel.title: Trade Script Glitch *explained*
channel.description:
I have done all scripts right with trade but when I click on *santa* no trade box comes up with him...is there a way to add a *right click* trade option to fix problem?
Here are my edits:
I am using project v 16
autospawn.cfg edit
[code]spawn = 1552 3243 3429 0 0 0 0 0 2 Santa's Holiday Shop[/code]
shops.cfg edit [code]shop = 39 Santa's_Holiday_Shop 2 2 1038 50000000 1057 20000000 1051 35000000 [/code]
client.java edit
[code]} else if (NPCID == 1552) { //Santa's Holiday Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 39; //Santa's Shop[/code]
Why is santa not bring up a shop box/trade box of a store...?

item.title: Trade Script Glitch *explained*
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

I have done all scripts right with trade but when I click on santa no trade box comes up with him…is there a way to add a right click trade option to fix problem?

Here are my edits:

I am using project v 16

autospawn.cfg edit

spawn = 1552	3243	3429	0	0	0	0	0	2	Santa's Holiday Shop

shops.cfg edit

shop = 39	Santa's_Holiday_Shop				2	2	1038	50000000	1057	20000000	1051	35000000

client.java edit

} else if (NPCID == 1552) { //Santa's Holiday Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 39; //Santa's Shop

Why is santa not bring up a shop box/trade box of a store…?

Read full topic
